mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_message (from_user_id, to_user_id, content, message_id, message_type, status, created_at) VALUES (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{content}, #{messageId}, #{messageType}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_message WHERE (from_user_id = #{fromUserId} AND to_user_id = #{toUserId}) OR (from_user_id = #{toUserId} AND to_user_id = #{fromUserId}) ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM t_message WHERE to_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 0 ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_message SET status = #{status} WHERE message_id = #{messageId}
UPDATE t_message SET status = 1 WHERE to_user_id = #{toUserId} AND from_user_id = #{fromUserId} AND status = 0
